attributes.action: make furter funds available for the Leeds Childrens Hospital, which has been cancelled due to local trust debts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds Teaching Hospitals have announced that the proposed Leeds Childrens & Maternity Hospital which was due to open in 2012 and had been approved by the govenment has now been cancelled due to Trust debts. This shouldn't even  be an issue in providing the best possible health care for children in Yorkshire. Details reported in the Yorkshire Evening Post.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " make furter funds available for the Leeds Childrens Hospital, which has been cancelled due to local trust debts."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13672.asp

Prime Minister's Office
